# <a name="address-book-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="b7fdb-102">Adresar u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b7fdb-102">Address book in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b7fdb-103">Vaš Outlook.com adresar se zove ljudi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b7fdb-103">Your Outlook.com address book is called People.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b7fdb-104">Da biste otišli na stranicu " [osobe](https://outlook.live.com/people/) ", izaberite stavku " **osobe** "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b7fdb-104">To go to your [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/) page, select **People**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="b7fdb-105">u donjem uglu stranice ili od birača aplikacije u gornjem uglu stranice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b7fdb-105">at the bottom corner of the page, or from the app selector at the top corner of the page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b7fdb-106">Saznajte kako da [kreirate, prikažete i uredite kontakte u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b7fdb-106">Learn how to [Create, view, and edit contacts in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
